news.title: New Preprint: Chip-Firing and the R10 Matroid
news.description: Published "Chip-Firing and the Sandpile Group of the R10 Matroid" on arXiv with co-author Alex McDonough. We provide a simple description of chip-firing on R10 using complex numbers and describe representatives for the 162 equivalence classes of its sandpile group.

news.title: Paper Submitted to LREC 2026
news.description: Submitted "MathMentorDB: A Massive Dataset of Authentic Online Mathematics Tutoring Dialogues" to the Language Resources and Evaluation Conference with co-author Kevyn Collins-Thompson.
